doc.after: Stanford currently has 36 varsity sports (18 female, 15 male, one coed), 19 club sports[180] and 37 intramural sportsâabout 800 students participate in intercollegiate sports with an offer of about 300 athletic scholarships. The sports teams are now officially referred to as the "Stanford Cardinal", which is a "mascot" name adopted in 1972 after the abandonment of the previous "Indians" owing to racial insensitivity complained by Native American students, referring to the deep red color, not the cardinal bird. It is a member of the Pacific-12 Conference and the Mountain Pacific Sports Federation with the participation in the inter-collegiate NCAA's Division I FBS.[181]
